title: Simvastatin and cholesterol physiological based pharmacokinetics model (PBPK)

description:
This repository provides the simvastatin and cholesterol physiological based pharmacokinetics model (PBPK).

If you have any questions or problems please open an issue

Funding

Florian Bartsch and Matthias König is supported by the Federal Ministry of Education and Research (BMBF, Germany) within the research network Systems Medicine of the Liver (LiSyM, grant number 031L0054). Matthias König is supported by the German Research Foundation (DFG) within the Research Unit Programme FOR 5151 QuaLiPerF (Quantifying Liver Perfusion-Function Relationship in Complex Resection - A Systems Medicine Approach)" by grant number 436883643.
